original: @94a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @94a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i k'a la tsa kra s'a dha na n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i k'a la tsa kra s'a dha na n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-kālacakra-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Glorious Wheel of Time

original: bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Primordial Buddha.

original: dpal ldan srid gsum mgon po mchog tu bde pa'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus rab tu spangs //
analyzed: dpal ldan srid gsum mgon po mchog tu bde pa'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus rab tu spangs //
translated: The glorious protector of the three worlds, supreme embodiment of bliss, completely free from all conceptualization,

original: spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang 'jig pa rnam par bral //
analyzed: spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang 'jig pa rnam par bral //
translated: The wisdom that is the equality of entity and non-entity, the cause of emanation and reabsorption, free from arising and disintegration,

original: skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hum yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor //
analyzed: skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hum yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor //
translated: Surrounded by the maṇḍala that arises from the syllable hūṃ and so forth, in accordance with the thoughts of beings,

original: bden pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du //
analyzed: bden pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo // 'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du //
translated: I pay homage to that Primordial Buddha, the supreme embodiment of compassion, abiding in the two truths.🔽Mañjuśrī taught the means of attainment

original: sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du //
translated: In the Condensed Tantra,

original: 'jig rten mgon gyis 'grel mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon gyis 'grel mdzad pa //
translated: And Lokeśvara composed a commentary.

original: de dag blangs te bri bar bya //🔽bstan bcos brtsam pa'i nus med cing //
analyzed: de dag blangs te bri bar bya // bstan bcos brtsam pa'i nus med cing //
translated: Having taken them up, I will write.🔽I am not able to compose a treatise,

original: mdzad las dbyung bar ma nus kyang //
analyzed: mdzad las dbyung bar ma nus kyang //
translated: and I am not able to extract it from the work of others,

original: bsgom phyir sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
analyzed: bsgom phyir sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
translated: but I have composed this sādhana for the sake of meditation,

original: blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol //
analyzed: blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol //
translated: so I request forbearance from the wise.

original: dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyi bya ba byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyi bya ba byed par 'dod pas /
translated: First, a supreme mantra practitioner who possesses compassion and wishes to perform the activities of others

original: zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi bye brag gis /
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi bye brag gis /
translated: should, through the distinctions of the activities of pacifying and so on,

original: rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su //
translated: in a place such as the shore of an ocean, a pleasant place for meditative concentration,

original: bla ma dang / @94b rgyal ba dang / de'i sras rnams la gus pas /
analyzed: bla ma dang / @94b rgyal ba dang / de'i sras rnams la gus pas /
translated: with devotion to the guru, the victors, and their sons,

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugs su gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugs su gsol /
translated: invite the blessed glorious original buddha, and so on, to be present in a painting or statue.

original: mchod ba dang / mandala la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams la /
analyzed: mchod ba dang / mandala la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams la /
translated: Arrange the offerings, maṇḍala, and so on, as explained in the scriptures.

original: 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdad la /
analyzed: 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdad la /
translated: Sit on a soft seat, and so on.

original: shin tu gus pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyis phyag btsal ba la sogs pa rnams dang / phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dang mnyam por gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu gus pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyis phyag btsal ba la sogs pa rnams dang / phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dang mnyam por gzhag pa ste /
translated: One should make obeisance with one's own mind endowed with great devotion, and the extensive external offerings.

original: ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsam khar bcug nas /
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsam khar bcug nas /
translated: Having placed in one's mouth a pill of the five nectars purified as taught, the size of a chickpea,

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang / ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba ni /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang / ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba ni /
translated: one should perform the purification of body, speech, mind, and gnosis, and so forth.

original: de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par gsungs
analyzed: de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par gsungs
translated: Moreover, the purification of body, speech, mind, and gnosis was taught by the noble Avalokiteśvara, moistened in his mind by supreme compassion and the empowerment of nectar, for the purpose of perfecting the glorious stainless deity.

original: pa / aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha /
analyzed: pa / aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha /
translated: [The purification] is: Oṃ āḥ huṃ hoḥ haṃ kṣaḥ.

original: pra dznyo p'a y'atam ka k'a ya waka tsitta dzny'ana badzram badzr'a badzr'a mri ta sv'a bh'a ba ku ru ku ru skandha dh'a tv'a ya t'a n'a ni /
analyzed: pra dznyo p'a y'atam ka k'a ya waka tsitta dzny'ana badzram badzr'a badzr'a mri ta sv'a bh'a ba ku ru ku ru skandha dh'a tv'a ya t'a n'a ni /
translated: prajñopāyātmaka kāya vāk citta jñāna vajra ambar ambar amṛta svabhāva kuru kuru skandhadhātvāyatanānām🔽

original: sv'a bh'a bam sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sv'a bh'a bam sv'a h'a /
translated: prajñopāya ātma kāya vāk citta jñāna vajra ambar ambar ambar amṛta svabhāva kuru kuru skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ svabhāvaṃ svāhā.

original: zhes pa'i sngags brjod la /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags brjod la /
translated: Reciting this mantra,

original: gtsug tor du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsam mo //
analyzed: gtsug tor du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsam mo //
translated: the mantrin should imagine that the syllable vaṃ in the uṣṇīṣa completely transforms into a sixteen-spoked vajra moon maṇḍala.

original: de nas gtsug tor nas brtsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul pags pa brjes pa ltar bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas gtsug tor nas brtsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul pags pa brjes pa ltar bsam mo //
translated: Then, beginning from the uṣṇīṣa down to the fingernails, imagine the body like a snake shedding its skin.

original: de ltar zhib dang rgyas pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhib dang rgyas pa dag la'o //
translated: Thus, in brief and in detail.

original: dbang la sogs pa gzhung ches kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa gzhung ches kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
translated: I have not written about the rites of enthrallment and so forth out of concern for excessive length.

original: de nas yang de nyid gsungs pa'i //
analyzed: de nas yang de nyid gsungs pa'i //
translated: Then, it is said,

original: aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddh'a: sarba dharma'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddh'a: sarba dharma'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
translated: oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ.

original: zhes pas brjod do //
analyzed: zhes pas brjod do //
translated: Recite this.

original: de nas dpral bar aom yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po //
analyzed: de nas dpral bar aom yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po //
translated: Then, on the forehead, the letter OṂ is transformed into Amitābha, white in color.

original: mgrin par a'a: yig yongs su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog dmar po /🔽snying gar hum yig yongs su gyur pa las don yod grub pa sku mdog nag po /
analyzed: mgrin par a'a: yig yongs su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog dmar po / snying gar hum yig yongs su gyur pa las don yod grub pa sku mdog nag po /
translated: On the throat, the letter ĀḤ is transformed into Ratnasaṃbhava, red in color.🔽On the heart, the letter HUṂ is transformed into Amoghasiddhi, black in color.

original: lte bar ho: yig yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog ser po /
analyzed: lte bar ho: yig yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog ser po /
translated: On the navel, the letter HOḥ is transformed into Vairocana, yellow in color.

original: gtsug tor du ham yig yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog ljang gu //
analyzed: gtsug tor du ham yig yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog ljang gu //
translated: On the crown, the letter HAṂ is transformed into Akṣobhya, green in color.🔽On the secret place, the letter KṢAḥ is transformed into Vajrasattva, blue in color.

original: gsang gnas su ksha: yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod pa ni /
analyzed: gsang gnas su ksha: yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod pa ni /
translated: This is the arrangement of the six families from the pure vajra face,

original: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams @95a * //🔽dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams @95a * // dang ldan pa'o //
translated: endowed with the colors and implements of the body that will be spoken of.

original: 'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa las rigs drug dgod pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa las rigs drug dgod pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the certainty of the arrangement of the six families from the pure vajra face.

original: de nas lag pa dag pa'i sngags brjod do //
analyzed: de nas lag pa dag pa'i sngags brjod do //
translated: Then, the mantra of the pure hands is recited.

original: aom hram: sarb'a sta r'a dza m'a ra kle shnta ka ra badzra t'i kshan du: kha tstshe da ma ma ka ram bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hram: sarb'a sta r'a dza m'a ra kle shnta ka ra badzra t'i kshan du: kha tstshe da ma ma ka ram bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ, all the afflictions of the king of the afflictions, the vajra of the afflictions, the sword, cut, cut!🔽The mantra of this very mantra, Oṃ hrīḥ, all the afflictions of the king of the afflictions, the vajra of the afflictions, the sword, cut, cut!

original: zhes pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis lag pa mnye ba ni lag ba dag pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis lag pa mnye ba ni lag ba dag pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: The purification of the hands is certain.

original: de nas aa la sogs pa'i la'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni /🔽aa ai ri au li /
analyzed: de nas aa la sogs pa'i la'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni / aa ai ri au li /
translated: Then, the fifteen vowels ending with ā la are:🔽a i ri u li,

original: aa ae aar ao aal /
analyzed: aa ae aar ao aal /
translated: a e ar o al,

original: ha ya ra wa la rnams lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtsa ba'i tshigs nas brtsams te /
analyzed: ha ya ra wa la rnams lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtsa ba'i tshigs nas brtsams te /
translated: ha ya ra wa la. The syllables are placed on the joints of the fingers of the left hand, beginning from the base joint of the little finger up to the thumb,

original: mthe bo'i bar gyi tshigs rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
analyzed: mthe bo'i bar gyi tshigs rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
translated: placing ākāśa and so on.

original: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshigs nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshigs nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, beginning from the joint above the thumb of the right hand,

original: mthe'u chung gi tshigs kyi bar du l'a yig la sogs ba dgod pa ni /
analyzed: mthe'u chung gi tshigs kyi bar du l'a yig la sogs ba dgod pa ni /
translated: up to the joint of the little finger, the syllables la and so on are placed:

original: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /
analyzed: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /
translated: la va ra ya ha,🔽a la o ar ai aḥ,

original: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a:/🔽l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
analyzed: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a:/🔽l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
translated: li ā ū ri ī a.

original: rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no //
translated: The elements are earth and so forth, in order.

original: de nas thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su hum yig kha dog sngon po bsam /
analyzed: de nas thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su hum yig kha dog sngon po bsam /
translated: Then, in the middle of the moon and sun in the joined palms, visualize a blue syllable hūṃ.

original: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Also, as taught in that very [Vajra]ḍāka Tantra, form the five-tined mudra endowed with the seed syllables of the moon, sun, and Rāhu,

original: gtsug tor nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: gtsug tor nas brtsams nas /
translated: and beginning from the crown protuberance,

original: rkang pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la reg par bya zhes sngags brjod la /
analyzed: rkang pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la reg par bya zhes sngags brjod la /
translated: touch the body, reciting the mantra.

original: aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a n'a dhi pa ti badzra k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'ana badzr'a badzr'a ka'a ya sva bh'a bam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a n'a dhi pa ti badzra k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'ana badzr'a badzr'a ka'a ya sva bh'a bam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ āḥ hūṃ hoḥ haṃ kṣaḥ kāya-vāk-citta-jñāna-ādhipati vajra-kāya-vāk-citta-jñāna vajra vajra-kāya-svabhāvaṃ kuru kuru svāhā

original: de'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas /
analyzed: de'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas /
translated: With that pride,

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra k'a ya b'a ka tsitta sva bh'a ba a'atam ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra k'a ya b'a ka tsitta sva bh'a ba a'atam ko& ham /
translated: oṃ sarva-tathāgata-vajra-kāya-vāk-citta-svabhāva-ātmako ’haṃ

original: zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dg pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dg pa'o //
translated: This is the purification of body, speech, mind, and gnosis.

original: de ltar rigs drug la dgod par byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar rigs drug la dgod par byas nas /
translated: Having thus established the six families,

original: de nas yan lag drug la dgod pa ni /
analyzed: de nas yan lag drug la dgod pa ni /
translated: then, the establishment in the six limbs is as follows.

original: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying gar gtad de /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying gar gtad de /
translated: The two thumbs of the two palms joined in añjali are placed at the heart.

original: aom hr'lim hri da y'a ya na ma:/🔽zhes pa dang / mgrin par aom hum gr'i w'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'lim hri da y'a ya na ma:/ zhes pa dang / mgrin par aom hum gr'i w'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Om hrīḥ hṛdaya-āyānaṃ namaḥ.🔽At the throat, om hūṃ grīvāyā svāhā.

original: zhes pa'o // mgo bor aom hr'um si ra se sv'a h'a /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // mgo bor aom hr'um si ra se sv'a h'a /
translated: At the head, om hrūṃ śirasa svāhā.

original: zhes pa'o // gtsug tor la aom hr'im shi kh'a yee boo sha ta /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // gtsug tor la aom hr'im shi kh'a yee boo sha ta /
translated: At the uṣṇīṣa, om hrīṃ śikhāyai vauṣaṭ.🔽On all the limbs, om hrīṃ kabāca-āya hūṃ.

original: ces pa'o // yan lag thams cad la aom hr'im ka ba ts'a ya hum zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa'o // yan lag thams cad la aom hr'im ka ba ts'a ya hum zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o //
translated: Reciting this, one should touch the entire body with the two hands.

original: mig la aom hr'am ne tr'a ya wa sha ta /🔽ces pas so //
analyzed: mig la aom hr'am ne tr'a ya wa sha ta / ces pas so //
translated: At the eyes, om hrīṃ netrābhyāṃ vaṣaṭ.

original: mig la aom hr'a: aast'a ya phat /
analyzed: mig la aom hr'a: aast'a ya phat /
translated: At the eyes, om hrīṃ astrāya phaṭ.

original: ces pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong dang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba @95b la g-yon gyis /
analyzed: ces pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong dang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba @95b la g-yon gyis /
translated: In all directions, snap one's fingers with the thumb and index finger, and for virtuous actions, with the left.🔽

original: mi dge ba'i bya ba la g-yas pas dgod do //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i bya ba la g-yas pas dgod do //
translated: Having snapped the fingers of the left and right hands in all directions, one should snap the fingers of the left hand in virtuous actions and snap the fingers of the right hand in nonvirtuous actions.

original: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya tri wa si ra: shi kha ka ba tsa ni tra aa sta badzra sha d'am ga sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
analyzed: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya tri wa si ra: shi kha ka ba tsa ni tra aa sta badzra sha d'am ga sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
translated: Then, one should recite the following mantra: “Oṃ, all tathāgatas, the three vajra wisdoms, the wisdom of the space of the mouth, the wisdom of the vajra sword, the nature of the self of the svabhāva aṃ.🔽”

original: zhes pa ni yan lag drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yan lag drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of snapping the fingers on the six limbs.

original: de nas srung 'khor gyi don du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dang por 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: de nas srung 'khor gyi don du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dang por 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa ni /
translated: Then, for the sake of the protection wheel, one should first visualize the four wheels in the center of the sky maṇḍala.

original: de nas de nyid du gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas de nyid du gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to visualize the protection wheel as taught there,

original: de yang dang por yam yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyor ro //
analyzed: de yang dang por yam yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyor ro //
translated: first, from the transformation of the syllable yaṃ, below and above is the wind maṇḍala, and from the transformation of the syllable huṃ, the vajra cross.

original: de nas ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang / wam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnam rim pa bzhin du /
analyzed: de nas ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang / wam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnam rim pa bzhin du /
translated: Then, from the transformation of the syllable RAM, there is a fire mandala, from the transformation of the syllable VAM, there is a water mandala, and from the transformation of the syllable LAM, there is an earth mandala,

original: kha dog nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa rnams /
analyzed: kha dog nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa rnams /
translated: black, red, white, and yellow in color, respectively, with two vajras of the same color as themselves and the syllable HUM at the bottom and top,

original: gzhu'i dbyibs dang / gru gsum dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi'i rnam pa la rlung yab dang bkra shis dang padma dang / 'khor lo rnams kyis spras pa go bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhu'i dbyibs dang / gru gsum dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi'i rnam pa la rlung yab dang bkra shis dang padma dang / 'khor lo rnams kyis spras pa go bar bya'o //
translated: which should be understood to be shaped like a bow, a triangle, a circle, and a square, respectively, and adorned with fans, auspicious knots, lotuses, and wheels.

original: de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa snga dro'i grib ma'i mtshams dang / grong khyer gyi mtshams dang / phyi rol du nam mkha' dang sa gzhi 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams su ste /
analyzed: de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa snga dro'i grib ma'i mtshams dang / grong khyer gyi mtshams dang / phyi rol du nam mkha' dang sa gzhi 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams su ste /
translated: Then, as it is said in that very tantra, the basis of the maṇḍala is the boundary of the morning shadow, the boundary of the city, and the boundary of the appearance of the gathering of the sky and the ground outside.

original: de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa khru bzhi brgya dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang / de ltar rab gsum bsgom pa dang / de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du grong khyer gyi mtshams su ra ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang /
analyzed: de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa khru bzhi brgya dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang / de ltar rab gsum bsgom pa dang / de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du grong khyer gyi mtshams su ra ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang /
translated: Moreover, the meditation on the celestial mansion endowed with four hundred cubits on the basis of the maṇḍala, the meditation on the three excellent ones, the meditation on the five walls at the boundary of the city for the purpose of protecting the city,

original: de ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang / steng du mda'i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang / dbus su rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer gyi mtshams su bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang / steng du mda'i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang / dbus su rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer gyi mtshams su bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the meditation on the vajra spears below, the very sharp net of arrows above, and the vajra ground in the middle at the boundary of the city,

original: de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padm'a /
analyzed: de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padm'a /
translated: then in the center of the celestial mansion, there is a lotus.

original: 'khor lo khru bcu gnyis pa mu khyud dang bcas pa 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo khru bcu gnyis pa mu khyud dang bcas pa 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on a wheel with a circumference of twelve cubits and eight spokes.

original: dbus kyi lte ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang bcas pa'i gdan no //
analyzed: dbus kyi lte ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang bcas pa'i gdan no //
translated: The center has a seat with a sun and is endowed with four cubits.

original: 'on kyang 'di bye brag ni hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / aom yig yongs su gyur pa las sam /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di bye brag ni hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / aom yig yongs su gyur pa las sam /
translated: However, the difference is that from the transformation of the syllable hūṃ, there is a vajra ground, and from the transformation of the syllable oṃ,

original: bhr'um yig yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang /🔽bam yig yongs su gyur pa'am /
analyzed: bhr'um yig yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang / bam yig yongs su gyur pa'am /
translated: there is a celestial mansion from the transformation of the syllable bhrūṃ.🔽From the transformation of the syllable vaṃ,

original: aa yig yongs su gyur @96a * //
analyzed: aa yig yongs su gyur @96a * //
translated: or from the transformation of the syllable aḥ,

original: pa las padma dang / ram yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pa las padma dang / ram yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms zhes bya'o //
translated: there is a lotus, and from the transformation of the syllable raṃ, there is a sun maṇḍala.

original: de ltar ra ba la sogs pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de ltar ra ba la sogs pa bsgoms nas /
translated: Having thus meditated on the protection wheel, etc.,

original: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag tu gyur pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag tu gyur pa 'di lta ste /
translated: again, as it is taught in that very [Hevajra Tantra], there is a transformation into the particular mantra, which is as follows:

original: aom a'a: h'um ra: badzra tsamdra s'u rya r'a hu k'a la aagne ya /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ra: badzra tsamdra s'u rya r'a hu k'a la aagne ya /
translated: oṃ āḥ hūṃ ra vajra-caṃdra-sūrya-rāhu-kālāgni-yām

original: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a na badzra badzra pr'a k'a r'an ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a na badzra badzra pr'a k'a r'an ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: kāya-vāk-citta-jñāna-vajra vajra-pāka-raṇa kuru kuru svāhā.

original: zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the fence.

original: aom bhr'um bi shva k'a ya badzra k'u t'a g'a ram ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bhr'um bi shva k'a ya badzra k'u t'a g'a ram ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ bhrūṃ viśva-kāya-vajra-kūtāgāraṃ kuru kuru svāhā.

original: zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the celestial mansion.

original: aom pa: bi shva badzra padmam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom pa: bi shva badzra padmam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ paḥ viśva-vajra-padmaṃ kuru kuru svāhā.

original: zhes pa ni padma'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni padma'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the lotus.

original: aom ra: badzra s'u ry'a sa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ra: badzra s'u ry'a sa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ raḥ vajra-sūrya-āsanaṃ kuru kuru svāhā.

original: zhes pa ni nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the sun seat.

original: de nas de'i steng du aam yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de nas de'i steng du aam yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: Then, upon that, from the transformation of a white aṃ syllable,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin /
translated: there is a moon maṇḍala, the nature of the mirrorlike gnosis.

original: ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las /
analyzed: ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las /
translated: From the collection of the consonants beginning with ka,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: one should meditate on the moon maṇḍala, the nature of the mirrorlike gnosis.

original: yang de nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g-yon dang g-yas su bskor ba /
analyzed: yang de nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g-yon dang g-yas su bskor ba /
translated: Also, in that very tantra it is said that one should meditate on the moon mandala, which is the nature of the thirty-two marks, turning to the left and right.

original: dbyangs yi gsum cu a'a: tsheg drag dang klad kor dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: dbyangs yi gsum cu a'a: tsheg drag dang klad kor dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni /
translated: The thirty vowels, a, aḥ, with visarga and head, are meditated on as follows.

original: aa ai ri au li 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: aa ai ri au li 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bsdus pa'o //
translated: The first five are a, i, r, u, and l.

original: de yang yon tan gyi dbye bas aa ae aar ao aal rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de yang yon tan gyi dbye bas aa ae aar ao aal rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o //
translated: The second five are a, e, ai, o, and au, which are included in the five by way of the division of qualities.

original: de nas rkyen gyis gyur pa ha ya ra wa la rnams ni gsum pa'i bsdus pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de nas rkyen gyis gyur pa ha ya ra wa la rnams ni gsum pa'i bsdus pa lnga'o //
translated: The third five are the five that are changed by the conditions, ha, ya, ra, wa, and la.

original: bsdus pa bco lnga'i mthar thig le ni aam yig sta /
analyzed: bsdus pa bco lnga'i mthar thig le ni aam yig sta /
translated: The fifteenth is the anusvāra, aṃ.

original: bcu drug pa ste /
analyzed: bcu drug pa ste /
translated: The sixteenth is aḥ.

original: 'di rnams ni g-yon skor gyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni g-yon skor gyis so //
translated: These are the left-turning [vowels].

original: de nas g-yas skor gyis nag po'i phyogs kyi dang po la sogs pa dgod pa /
analyzed: de nas g-yas skor gyis nag po'i phyogs kyi dang po la sogs pa dgod pa /
translated: Then, the right-turning [vowels] are placed on the first of the dark [fortnights], and so on.

original: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /
analyzed: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a /
translated: lā vā rā yā hā

original: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
analyzed: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
translated: a ā o au a ai aḥ

original: de ltar bco lnga dang gnam stong gi mthar tsheg drag ni a'a a'a: ste /
analyzed: de ltar bco lnga dang gnam stong gi mthar tsheg drag ni a'a a'a: ste /
translated: Thus, at the end of the fifteenth and the thirtieth, there is a visarga, which is ā āḥ.

original: 'di ni de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the “sixteenth vowel.”

original: de nas de'i steng du a'a: yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas de'i steng du a'a: yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bsam mo //
translated: Then, on top of that, one should think of the red āḥ syllable, which is completely transformed into a sun maṇḍala, the nature of the gnosis of uniformity, the nature of the girl.

original: yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang /
analyzed: yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang /
translated: Again, in that very tantra, the ka, etc., syllables are the nature of the forty consonants in the sun maṇḍala.

original: ha ya ra wa la rnams dang / sde tshan drug ste sum cu rtsa lnga dang / de nyid kyis brjod pa'i la wa ya dadha rnams bzung @96b ste ;🔽lla wba dda dhdha lla wwa rra yya hha ssa wwa shsha shasha thka thka /
analyzed: ha ya ra wa la rnams dang / sde tshan drug ste sum cu rtsa lnga dang / de nyid kyis brjod pa'i la wa ya dadha rnams bzung @96b ste ; lla wba dda dhdha lla wwa rra yya hha ssa wwa shsha shasha thka thka /
translated: Those are the thirty-five, the six classes, and the la, va, ya, and dha that are mentioned there.

original: tta ththa dda dhdha nna /
analyzed: tta ththa dda dhdha nna /
translated: lla, va, da, dha, la, va, ra, ra, ya, ha, ha, sa, va, ṣa, ṣa, ṣa, tha, tha, ka, tha, tha, da, dha, dha, na, na,

original: ppa phpha bba bhbha mma /
analyzed: ppa phpha bba bhbha mma /
translated: pa, pha, ba, bha, ma, ma,🔽ya, ra, la, va, śa, ṣa, sa, ha, kṣa,

original: tta ththa dda dhdha nna /
analyzed: tta ththa dda dhdha nna /
translated: ta, tha, da, dha, na, na,

original: tstsa tshtsha dzdza dzhdzha nynya /
analyzed: tstsa tshtsha dzdza dzhdzha nynya /
translated: ca, cha, ja, jha, ña, ña,

original: kka khkha gga ghgha ngnga rnams te /
analyzed: kka khkha gga ghgha ngnga rnams te /
translated: The letters ka, kha, ga, gha, ṅa,

original: bzhi bcu thams pa sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas g-yas skor gyis so //
analyzed: bzhi bcu thams pa sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas g-yas skor gyis so //
translated: and so on, are in the order of the right, by the division of earth and so on.

original: de ltar g-yon skor gyi /🔽nga gha ga kha ka /🔽nya dzha dza tsha tsa /
analyzed: de ltar g-yon skor gyi / nga gha ga kha ka / nya dzha dza tsha tsa /
translated: In the same way, in the order of the left,🔽ṇa, ḍha, da, dha, na,

original: na dha da tha ta /
analyzed: na dha da tha ta /
translated: ña, jha, ja, jha, ña,

original: ma ba pha pa /🔽na dha da tha ta /
analyzed: ma ba pha pa / na dha da tha ta /
translated: ma, bha, ba, ma,🔽ya, śa, ṣa, sa, ha, la,

original: thka sha sha wa sa ha ya ra wa la dha da ya wa la ste /
analyzed: thka sha sha wa sa ha ya ra wa la dha da ya wa la ste /
translated: and ḍa, da, ya, va, la,

original: de ltar bzhi bcu ste gsal byed brgyad cu zhes so //🔽de nas de dag gi dbus su h'um yig sngon po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje h'um gis mtshan pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bzhi bcu ste gsal byed brgyad cu zhes so // de nas de dag gi dbus su h'um yig sngon po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje h'um gis mtshan pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: are the forty. Thus, the eighty-four phonemes are complete.🔽Then, in the middle of those, one should meditate on a multicolored vajra marked with hūṃ, arisen from the blue letter hūṃ, which is the nature of the gnosis of discernment.

original: de nas gnas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la hr'i: yig gis spras pa las bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gnas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la hr'i: yig gis spras pa las bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the three places mixed into one, marked with the letter hrīḥ, which is the nature of the gnosis of successful activities.

original: de nas lus kyi yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ham yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabs su 'chad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de nas lus kyi yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ham yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabs su 'chad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: Then, the complete body parts are the nature of the syllable haṃ, the nature of the utterly pure realm of reality, the glorious Wheel of Time explained below in the context of the homage.

original: 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa la kha dog ser po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa la kha dog ser po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
translated: However, the twenty-six-armed one holds an elephant skin with the remaining two arms, is yellow, and stands with one leg extended and one drawn in.

original: zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma /
translated: He has one face and three eyes.

original: phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
translated: He holds a flaying knife and skull cup in his two main hands.

original: phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs yum gyis mgul nas 'khyud pa /🔽sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs yum gyis mgul nas 'khyud pa / sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments and is embraced by the multicolored mother around his neck.🔽He is adorned with snake ornaments.

original: stag gi sham thabs sbyangs pa /
analyzed: stag gi sham thabs sbyangs pa /
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt.

original: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgom mo //
analyzed: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgom mo //
translated: Meditate on oneself as the wrathful lord Vajrakumāra.

original: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las /
analyzed: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las /
translated: Also, as stated in that very tantra, the placement of the seals and so on:

original: phyag rgya drug rang gi lus la dgod pa /🔽aom ham ha: b'a ma dakshi na karnna yor badzra kunda li hum h'um phat phat /
analyzed: phyag rgya drug rang gi lus la dgod pa / aom ham ha: b'a ma dakshi na karnna yor badzra kunda li hum h'um phat phat /
translated: Assigning the six mudras to one's body.🔽Om ham ha: on the right ear, vajra kun dali hum hum phat phat.🔽Om am a: on the left ear, vajra mekhala vajra kinthika hum hum phat phat.🔽Om a a: on the right shoulder, vajra rucaka ko hum hum phat phat.

translated: Indra, Agni, Yama, Nairṛta, Varuṇa, Vāyu, Kubera, Īśāna, Brahmā, Viṣṇu, Vināyaka, Kārttikeya, Nandin, Mahākāla, Grahanakṣatra, Pālaka,

original: su rendra su rendra pha nindra bh'u tendra na rendra sam stu ta tsa ra n'a ya /
analyzed: su rendra su rendra pha nindra bh'u tendra na rendra sam stu ta tsa ra n'a ya /
translated: Surindra, Surendrapāṇindra, Bhūtendranarendrasantuccharana.

original: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the Blessed One's sixteen feet.

original: bdud rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bshad pas 'dir ma bris so //
analyzed: bdud rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bshad pas 'dir ma bris so //
translated: The seed syllables of the garlands of hundreds of Māra families were explained above in the section on reciting the mantra, so they are not written here.

original: rkang pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni gzhung ches dgos pas ma bris so //🔽de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @98a * //
analyzed: rkang pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni gzhung ches dgos pas ma bris so // de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @98a * //
translated: The seventy-second foot is not written here because the text is too extensive.

original: dkar po la aom yig dgod do //
analyzed: dkar po la aom yig dgod do //
translated: Then, as stated, the vajra placement is the placement of the glorious vajra limbs. On the forehead, on a white moon maṇḍala, one should place the syllable oṃ.

original: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la a'a: yig dgod do //🔽snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la h'um yig dgod do //
analyzed: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la a'a: yig dgod do // snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la h'um yig dgod do //
translated: At the throat, one should place the syllable A on a red solar mandala.🔽At the heart, one should place the syllable Hum on a black Rahu mandala.

original: lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgod do //
analyzed: lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgod do //
translated: At the navel, one should place the syllable Ho on a yellow Kâla-agni mandala.

original: gtsug tor dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la ham ksha: dgod do //
analyzed: gtsug tor dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la ham ksha: dgod do //
translated: At the crown and the secret place, one should place the syllables Ham and Ksh, respectively, on a green consciousness mandala and a blue gnosis mandala.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams te /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams te /
translated: Having thus meditated on the six mandalas, from the complete transformation of those very mandalas and those very seed syllables, there are the vajras,

original: rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang / rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa pa dang / rtse mo dgu pa dang / rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang / rtse mo lnga pa dang / yang rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang / rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa pa dang / rtse mo dgu pa dang / rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang / rtse mo lnga pa dang / yang rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa zhes pa ste /
translated: which are the seventeen-spoked, the thirty-three-spoked, the nine-spoked, the sixty-five-spoked, the five-spoked, and the thirty-three-spoked.

original: rdo rje rnams kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: The vajras should be meditated as the size taught, with the colors of the individual mandalas.

original: yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa sor gcig pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa sor gcig pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: As taught in that very tantra, one should meditate the pure vajra gem, one finger in size.

original: spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor gnyis pa'o //
translated: The pure crown cakra is two fingers.

original: dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o //
translated: The pure forehead cakra is four fingers.

original: mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor lnga pa'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor lnga pa'o //
translated: The pure throat cakra is five fingers.

original: snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor brgyad pa'o //
translated: The pure heart cakra is eight fingers.

original: lte ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor dgu pa'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor dgu pa'o //
translated: The pure navel cakra is nine fingers.

original: gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: The pure secret cakra is twelve fingers.

translated: Next, at the elbow of the left arm, there is dadi dirdur dilim dam.🔽Gha ghi gir ghur gil gham.🔽Ga gi gir gu gil gam.

original: ka ki kir ku kil kam /
analyzed: ka ki kir ku kil kam /
translated: Ka ki kir ku kil kam.

original: zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, in the sky and so forth,

analyzed: thung du drug gi dbye ba dang / ka'i sde tshan yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo sum cu rtsa gcig pa bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: g-yas kyi dpyi mgo'i tshigs la ring po rnams so //

analyzed: pus mo g-yon pa'i tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung du rnams so //

translated: The long vowels are on the right knee.🔽The short vowels are on the left ankle.🔽The long vowels are on the right ankle.

analyzed: long bu g-yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag nyid do zhes pa ni tshigs rnams la rdo rje dgod pa'i cho ga'o //

analyzed: rdo rje de rnams kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa /
translated: Those vajras are equal in size to the maṇḍalas of space and so forth.

original: de nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on them.

analyzed: de rnams rim pa de bzhin bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams la /
translated: On those cakras, which are to be done in that sequence,

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te /
translated: beginning with the small finger of the left hand,

original: rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la thung du drug gi dbye bas ka'i sde tshan nga la sogs pa drug drug las byung ba'i rtse mo bdun bdun dang ldan pa'i rdo rje lnga bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la thung du drug gi dbye bas ka'i sde tshan nga la sogs pa drug drug las byung ba'i rtse mo bdun bdun dang ldan pa'i rdo rje lnga bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on five vajras endowed with seven prongs each, which arise from the six classes of ka, ṭa, ṭa, ta, pa, and ya, by way of the division of the six short vowels on the five joints.

original: de ltar g-yas kyi mthe bo'i tshigs steng ma nas brtsams te /🔽tshigs lnga la ring po drug dang ldan pa'i kk'a la sogs pa drug drug yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar g-yas kyi mthe bo'i tshigs steng ma nas brtsams te / tshigs lnga la ring po drug dang ldan pa'i kk'a la sogs pa drug drug yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams so //
translated: In that way, beginning with the upper joint of the thumb of the right hand,🔽the six classes of ka, ṭa, ṭa, ta, pa, and ya, endowed with six long vowels, transform into vajras on the five joints.

original: g-yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la tsa'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la tsa'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams so //
translated: On the middle joints of the fingers of the left hand, the six classes of ca, ṭa, ṭa, ta, pa, and ya, by nature short, transform into vajras.

original: g-yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid rnams las so //🔽g-yon gyi sor mo'i steng gi tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid rnams las so // g-yon gyi sor mo'i steng gi tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid rnams so //
translated: On the joints of the middle fingers of the left hand, from the long vowels.🔽On the upper joints of the left fingers, from the short vowels of the ta group.

original: g-yas kyi sor mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las so //🔽rkang pa g-yon gyi sor mo'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar pa'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyi bdag nyid las so //
analyzed: g-yas kyi sor mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las so // rkang pa g-yon gyi sor mo'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar pa'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyi bdag nyid las so //
translated: On the joints of the fingers of the right hand, from the long vowels.🔽On the joints of the fingers of the left foot, from the short vowels of the pa group, as before.

original: rkang pa g-yas pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ring po rnams kyis bdag nyid las so //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ring po rnams kyis bdag nyid las so //
translated: On the joints of the fingers of the right foot, from the long vowels, as before.

original: de nas g-yon pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ta'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyis bdag nyid las so //
analyzed: de nas g-yon pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ta'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyis bdag nyid las so //
translated: Then, on the joints of the left hand, from the short vowels of the ta group, as before.

original: g-yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid las so //
analyzed: g-yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid las so //
translated: On the right hand, from the long vowels.

original: de ltar g-yon pa'i tshigs rnams la sa'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid rnams las so //
analyzed: de ltar g-yon pa'i tshigs rnams la sa'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid rnams las so //
translated: Thus, on the joints of the left hand, from the short vowels of the sa group.

original: g-yas pa'i tshig rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams te /🔽rim pa bzhin sde tshan rnams yongs su dag pa las ljang gu @99a * //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i tshig rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams te / rim pa bzhin sde tshan rnams yongs su dag pa las ljang gu @99a * //
translated: The vajras in the right-hand syllables are from the long vowel nature.

original: dang ; nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'i kha dog rnams /
analyzed: dang ; nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'i kha dog rnams /
translated: The colors are green, black, red, white, and yellow, respectively, from the complete purity of the classes.

original: so so'i tshigs kyi tshad kyis so //
analyzed: so so'i tshigs kyi tshad kyis so //
translated: The colors are the size of each joint.🔽Next, the placement of the vajras in the ears and so forth is as taught in the same text:

original: de nas rna ba la sogs par rdo rje dgod pa ni /🔽de nyid las gsungs pa ltar /
analyzed: de nas rna ba la sogs par rdo rje dgod pa ni / de nyid las gsungs pa ltar /
translated: “In the ears, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from a ā.🔽In the nostrils, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from e ai.🔽In the eyes, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from o au.🔽In the tongue and uvula, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from aṃ aḥ.

original: rna ba dag tu aa a'a dag las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsgom par bya'o //🔽sna bug dag tu ae aee dag las so //
analyzed: rna ba dag tu aa a'a dag las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsgom par bya'o // sna bug dag tu ae aee dag las so //
translated: In the vajra and secret [places], meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ka kha.🔽In the mind and the channel of emission, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ga gha.🔽In the anus and the channel of the regenerative fluid, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ṅa ña.🔽In the thighs and the channel of the thighs, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ṭa ṭha.

original: mig dag tu aar a'ar dag las so //🔽lce dang lce chung dag la ao aoo dag las so //
analyzed: mig dag tu aar a'ar dag las so // lce dang lce chung dag la ao aoo dag las so //
translated: In the knees and the channel of the knees, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ḍa ḍha.🔽In the calves and the channel of the calves, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ta tha.🔽In the ankles and the channel of the ankles, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from da dha.🔽In the toes and the channel of the toes, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from na na.🔽In the soles of the feet and the channel of the soles of the feet, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from pa pha.🔽In the heels and the channel of the heels, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ba bha.🔽In the toes and the channel of the toes, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ma ya.

original: rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la aal a'al dag las so //🔽yid dang khu ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa dag ka aam a:a dag las te /
analyzed: rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la aal a'al dag las so //🔽yid dang khu ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa dag ka aam a:a dag las te /
translated: In the nails and the channel of the nails, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ra la.🔽In the skin and the channel of the skin, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from va śa.🔽In the flesh and the channel of the flesh, meditate on the three-pointed vajras from ṣa sa.🔽In the sinews and the channel of the sinews, meditate on the three-pointed vaj

analyzed: 'di rnams kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin kha dog gi dbye ba dang ldan par sor gcig gi tshad kyis so //
translated: These are also one finger in size, endowed with the division of colors, in due order.

original: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar rna ba la sogs par rdo rje sor gcig pa zhes pas so //
analyzed: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar rna ba la sogs par rdo rje sor gcig pa zhes pas so //
translated: And as it is said in that very (text), in the ear, etc., (they are) one finger of the vajra.

original: de nas gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams la rdo rje dgod pa ni /
analyzed: de nas gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams la rdo rje dgod pa ni /
translated: Then, the placement of the vajras in the ushnisha, etc.

original: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la ha h'a dag las rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o //🔽lce dang rkan dag la ya y'a dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la ha h'a dag las rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o // lce dang rkan dag la ya y'a dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: And that is as it is said in that very (text): In the ushnisha and the head, from HA HA, (there is) a five-pointed vajra.🔽On the tongue and palate, from YA YA, (there is) a five-pointed vajra.

original: lag mthil dag la ra r'a dag las so //🔽rkang mthil dag la wa w'a dag las so //
analyzed: lag mthil dag la ra r'a dag las so // rkang mthil dag la wa w'a dag las so //
translated: On the palms of the hands, from RA RA, (there is) a five-pointed vajra.🔽On the soles of the feet, from WA WA, (there is) a five-pointed vajra.

original: 'phongs kyi g-yas g-yon dag la l'a dag las so //
analyzed: 'phongs kyi g-yas g-yon dag la l'a dag las so //
translated: On the right and left buttocks, from LA LA, (there is) a five-pointed vajra.

original: de ltar rdo rje'i lus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje'i lus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, one should meditate on oneself as the vajra body.

original: de rnams kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams par dag par gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams par dag par gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristics of the purities of their ushnisha, etc. are taught.

original: de nas bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa ni /
translated: Then, the burning of the hosts of demons is as follows.

original: de yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'bar bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud kyi chogs sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba rnams bsregs nas /
analyzed: de yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'bar bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud kyi chogs sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba rnams bsregs nas /
translated: Just as it is taught in that tantra, light rays radiate from those [vajras], and the hosts of demons who reside in the ten directions and harm sentient beings are burned by the blazing vajras.

original: steng du ljang gu 'bar ba dang / 'og tu sngon po 'bar ba dang / shar dang shar lhor nag po 'bar ba dang / lho dang bden bral du dmar po 'bar ba dang / byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po 'bar ba dang / nub dang rlung du ser po 'bar ba dang zhes so //
analyzed: steng du ljang gu 'bar ba dang / 'og tu sngon po 'bar ba dang / shar dang shar lhor nag po 'bar ba dang / lho dang bden bral du dmar po 'bar ba dang / byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po 'bar ba dang / nub dang rlung du ser po 'bar ba dang zhes so //
translated: The blazing above is green, the blazing below is blue, the blazing black in the east and southeast, the blazing red in the south and southwest, the blazing white in the north and northeast, and the blazing yellow in the west and northwest.

original: bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
translated: Recite the mantra for burning the hosts of demons.

original: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: hra: hra: hra: hra: ra: ra: ra: ra: badzra aa na la sarba a'a ba ra na dharm'a pra la ya sva bh'a ba sarba m'a ra ya k'a yi ka bighna bi n'a da sha di ga t'a n'am k'a ya b'a ka tsitt'a
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: hra: hra: hra: hra: ra: ra: ra: ra: badzra aa na la sarba a'a ba ra na dharm'a pra la ya sva bh'a ba sarba m'a ra ya k'a yi ka bighna bi n'a da sha di ga t'a n'am k'a ya b'a ka tsitt'a
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ hoḥ haṃ kṣaḥ hram hram hram hram raṃ raṃ raṃ raṃ vajra-anala sarva-āvaraṇa-dharmā-pra-laya svabhāva sarva-mārayakāya-vikṣobhana-vidhvaṃsana-di-gata-nāṃ kāya-vāk-citta

original: ni / da ha da ha /
analyzed: ni / da ha da ha /
translated: daha daha

original: pa tsa pa tsa /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa /
translated: paca paca

original: bha sim ku ru ku ru h'um hum phat phat /
analyzed: bha sim ku ru ku ru h'um hum phat phat /
translated: bhasmi-kuru kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ

original: ces pa ni bdud rnams rnam par bsreg pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni bdud rnams rnam par bsreg pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of burning the māras.

original: de nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi cho ga rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang dang / rab gsum dang / ra @99b ba lnga rnams kyi nang dang / phyi rol bsrung ba'i don du /
analyzed: de nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi cho ga rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang dang / rab gsum dang / ra @99b ba lnga rnams kyi nang dang / phyi rol bsrung ba'i don du /
translated: Then, for the protection of the inner and outer of the celestial mansion, the three secrets, and the five rasanā and lalanā, the pure body, speech, and mind,

original: khro bo la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin spor bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin spor bar bya'o //
translated: one should visualize the wrathful ones and so forth in sequence.

original: de nas yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar dang por rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar dang por rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la /
translated: Then, as taught in that very tantra, first one should meditate on oneself as Vajravega.

original: de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ha yar wa la rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsam mo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ha yar wa la rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsam mo //
translated: At his heart, on a sun disk, one should imagine the form of the stacked syllables ha ya wa la.

original: de'i steng du ha las byung ba'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dang mtshan ma dang zhal rnams dang ldan pa'i sku mdog ljang gu sna bug g-yon pa nas spros te /
analyzed: de'i steng du ha las byung ba'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dang mtshan ma dang zhal rnams dang ldan pa'i sku mdog ljang gu sna bug g-yon pa nas spros te /
translated: From that, a green body endowed with the previously mentioned seals, signs, and faces, arises from the left nostril.

original: gtso bo'i dbu'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba'am nyi ma'i steng du gtsug tor can g-yas brkyang du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gtso bo'i dbu'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba'am nyi ma'i steng du gtsug tor can g-yas brkyang du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Above the head of the principal figure, in the interior of the celestial mansion, on a moon or sun, sits Uṣṇīṣacakravartin, standing with his right leg straight.

original: de ltar ha yig ring po las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po sna bug g-yas nas bton nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i steng du nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod do //🔽de ltar ya yig las byung ba'i bgegs mthar byed kha dog nag po /
analyzed: de ltar ha yig ring po las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po sna bug g-yas nas bton nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i steng du nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod do // de ltar ya yig las byung ba'i bgegs mthar byed kha dog nag po /
translated: In this way, one should emit from the long ha syllable the blue-colored Sumbha-rāja from the right nostril and place him on the vajra ground on a sun or moon.

original: sna bug g-yog pa nas byung nas shar phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sna bug g-yog pa nas byung nas shar phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should emit from the ya syllable the black-colored Vighna-jaya from the left nostril and place him in the east on a moon or sun.

original: de ltar y'a yig yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbyug sngon can kha dog nag po sna bug g-yas nas bton te /
analyzed: de ltar y'a yig yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbyug sngon can kha dog nag po sna bug g-yas nas bton te /
translated: In this way, the complete syllable ya is the blue Nīladaṇḍa, who is black, and is emitted from the right nostril.

original: me mtshams su nyi ma'am zla ba la dgod do //
analyzed: me mtshams su nyi ma'am zla ba la dgod do //
translated: He is placed in the southeast on the sun or moon.

original: ri yig las byung ba'i shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dmar po /
analyzed: ri yig las byung ba'i shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dmar po /
translated: The wisdom dakini, who arises from the syllable ri, is red.

original: mig g-yo nas bton nas lho phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
analyzed: mig g-yo nas bton nas lho phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
translated: She is emitted from the left eye and is placed in the south on the sun or moon.

original: de ltar r'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po /
analyzed: de ltar r'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po /
translated: In this way, the complete syllable ri is the red Kāmarāja,

original: mi g-yas nas bton te bden bral du nyi ma'am zla ba la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mi g-yas nas bton te bden bral du nyi ma'am zla ba la dgod par bya'o //
translated: who is emitted from the right ear and is placed in the southwest on the sun or moon.

original: de ltar w'u yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i padma mthar byed dkar po lce las bton te /
analyzed: de ltar w'u yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i padma mthar byed dkar po lce las bton te /
translated: In this way, the complete syllable vu is the white Padmāntaka, who is emitted from the tongue.

original: byang du zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
analyzed: byang du zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
translated: He is placed in the north on the sun or moon.

original: w'u yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i mi g-yo ba dkar po dri chu'i lam nas bton te /
analyzed: w'u yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i mi g-yo ba dkar po dri chu'i lam nas bton te /
translated: The complete syllable vu is the white Acala, who is emitted from the urethra.

original: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
translated: He is placed in the northeast on the sun or moon.

original: l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje mthar byed ser po chu min gyi lam nas bton te /
analyzed: l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje mthar byed ser po chu min gyi lam nas bton te /
translated: From the LA letter, one should emit the complete yellow Yamântaka, who is expelled through the path of the water-carrying vessel.

original: nub phyogs su zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
analyzed: nub phyogs su zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
translated: He should be placed in the west on a moon or sun.

original: de ltar l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs po che ser po rdo rje gtsug tor nas bton te /
analyzed: de ltar l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs po che ser po rdo rje gtsug tor nas bton te /
translated: In that way, from the LA letter, one should emit the complete yellow Maheśvara, who is expelled through the path of the vajra uṣṇīṣa.

original: rlung gi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
translated: He should be placed in the northwest on a moon or sun.

original: yang na sdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas thams cad nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas thams cad nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
translated: Or, following the Tantra of the Gathering, all of them should be placed on sun seats.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo dgod pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo dgod pa'o //
translated: This is the placement of the Kālacakra.

original: de nas gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du zad par nam mkha' la sogs pa @100a * //🔽spro ba ste /
analyzed: de nas gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du zad par nam mkha' la sogs pa @100a * // spro ba ste /
translated: Then, outside the celestial mansion, one should emanate the all-encompassing space and so forth.

original: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nga nya na man rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
analyzed: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nga nya na man rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
translated: Moreover, as it is stated in that [Vajra] Tent Tantra, one should meditate on the form of the stacked letters A, I, U, E, and O on a sun maṇḍala at the heart.

original: nga d'a las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par nam mkha'i sngon du bshad pa'i sgo rnams nas bton te /
analyzed: nga d'a las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par nam mkha'i sngon du bshad pa'i sgo rnams nas bton te /
translated: The complete meditative attainment of the base of infinite space is called the base of infinite consciousness.🔽

original: gzhal yas khang gi steng dang gnod mdzes rgyal po'i 'og dag tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //🔽de ltar nir n'ir dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi steng dang gnod mdzes rgyal po'i 'og dag tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o // de ltar nir n'ir dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: I should meditate on the complete pervasion of space, which is the complete perfection of the letter ḍā, through the doors explained previously, above the celestial mansion and below the king of the fierce ones.🔽I should meditate on the complete pervasion of wind, which is the complete perfection of the letter ṇi, in the northeast and southeast, on the wind maṇḍala.

original: de ltar nir n'ir dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par me lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nir n'ir dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par me lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: I should meditate on the complete pervasion of fire, which is the complete perfection of the letter ṇi, in the south and in the southwest, on the fire maṇḍala.

original: de ltar mu m'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par chu byang dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su chu'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar mu m'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par chu byang dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su chu'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: I should meditate on the complete pervasion of water, which is the complete perfection of the letter mu, in the north and in the northeast, on the water maṇḍala.

original: de ltar nil n'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su sa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nil n'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su sa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should meditate on the earth maṇḍala in the northeast and southeast, which are completely filled with na and ṇi.

original: de ltar gha dzha dha bha dha rnams su brtsegs pa'i yi ge bsgoms la /
analyzed: de ltar gha dzha dha bha dha rnams su brtsegs pa'i yi ge bsgoms la /
translated: In this way, one should meditate on the stacked syllables in gha, jha, dha, bha, and dha.

original: de rnams las phyogs skyong bcu spro ba ni /
analyzed: de rnams las phyogs skyong bcu spro ba ni /
translated: The emanation of the ten direction protectors is as follows:🔽From gha and ghā, Brahmā and Viṣṇu are completely emanated.

original: gha gh'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug / ljang gu dang sngon po /
analyzed: gha gh'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug / ljang gu dang sngon po /
translated: They are green and blue,

original: ngang pa dang bya khyung la gnas pa /
analyzed: ngang pa dang bya khyung la gnas pa /
translated: and they stand on a swan and garuḍa.

original: ra ba la phyogs pa /
analyzed: ra ba la phyogs pa /
translated: They face the enclosure.

original: steng du tshangs pa /
analyzed: steng du tshangs pa /
translated: Brahmā is above,

original: 'og tu khyab 'jug go //
analyzed: 'og tu khyab 'jug go //
translated: and Viṣṇu is below.🔽From jhṛ and jhā, Nairṛtī and Vāyavī are completely emanated.

original: de nas dzhri dzh'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i bden bral dang rlung lha dag / kha dog nag po /
analyzed: de nas dzhri dzh'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i bden bral dang rlung lha dag / kha dog nag po /
translated: They are black,

original: yi dags dang ri dags la gnas pa /
analyzed: yi dags dang ri dags la gnas pa /
translated: and they stand on a ghost and a deer.

original: shar dang me mtshams su'o //
analyzed: shar dang me mtshams su'o //
translated: They are in the east and southeast.

original: de ltar lho dang bden bral du /
analyzed: de ltar lho dang bden bral du /
translated: In this way, in the south and southwest,

original: dhri dhr'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje dang me lha /
analyzed: dhri dhr'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje dang me lha /
translated: from dhrī and dharī, Yama and Agni are completely emanated.

original: kha dog dmar po ma he dang lug la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog dmar po ma he dang lug la gnas pa'o //
translated: The color is red, and it is located in the buffalo and sheep.

original: de ltar byang dang dbang ldan du bhu bh'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho dang bde byed /
analyzed: de ltar byang dang dbang ldan du bhu bh'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho dang bde byed /
translated: In this way, in the north and in the northeast, from bhu and bhu, the oceans and Śiva are complete.

original: kha dog dkar po chu srin dang khyu mchog la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog dkar po chu srin dang khyu mchog la gnas pa'o //
translated: The color is white, and it is located in the crocodile and bull.

original: de ltar nub phyogs dang rlung du dhli dh'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin /
analyzed: de ltar nub phyogs dang rlung du dhli dh'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin /
translated: In this way, in the west and in the southwest, from dhi and dhi, Indra and Rākṣasa are complete.

original: kha dog ser po /
analyzed: kha dog ser po /
translated: The color is yellow,

original: glang po che dang ba man la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: glang po che dang ba man la gnas pa'o //
translated: and it is located in the elephant and horse.

original: de ltar phyogs skyong rnams ra ba'i nang du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs skyong rnams ra ba'i nang du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should meditate on the guardians of the directions inside the enclosure.

original: de nas rab bsrung ba'i don du gza' rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rab bsrung ba'i don du gza' rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Next, in order to protect, one should meditate on the planets.

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
translated: On the previously mentioned sun maṇḍala,

original: ga dza da ba da rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas pa las /
analyzed: ga dza da ba da rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas pa las /
translated: the ga, ja, da, ba, and da are stacked in order.

original: ga g'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me /
analyzed: ga g'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me /
translated: From the two gas, Rāhu and Ketu are complete.

original: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la @100b gnas pa /
analyzed: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la @100b gnas pa /
translated: They are located in the maṇḍala of space.

original: rab gsum la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: rab gsum la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: The three upper ones are in the upper direction, and the three lower ones are in the lower direction, in the middle of the circle of the sky.

original: de ltar dzi dz'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
analyzed: de ltar dzi dz'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
translated: Thus, from the two jī and jī, the complete moon and sun are situated in the circle of wind.

original: shar dang me mtshams su dgod do //🔽dri dr'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gza' lag dang bkra shis /
analyzed: shar dang me mtshams su dgod do // dri dr'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gza' lag dang bkra shis /
translated: They are placed in the east and southeast.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
translated: From the two dri and dra, the complete Mars and Mercury are situated in the circle of fire.

original: lho dang bden bral du dgod do //
analyzed: lho dang bden bral du dgod do //
translated: They are placed in the south and southwest.

original: de ltar bu b'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pa wa sangs dang phur bu chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
analyzed: de ltar bu b'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pa wa sangs dang phur bu chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
translated: Thus, from the two bu and vau, the complete Jupiter and Venus are situated in the circle of water.

original: byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o //
analyzed: byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o //
translated: They are placed in the north and northeast.

original: de ltar dli dl'i dag las yongs su dag pa'i mjug rings dang spen pa /
analyzed: de ltar dli dl'i dag las yongs su dag pa'i mjug rings dang spen pa /
translated: Thus, from the two dli and dli, the complete Saturn and Rāhu are situated in the circle of earth.

original: sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu ste /
analyzed: sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu ste /
translated: They are placed in the west and northwest.

original: 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams bsgom pa'o //
translated: Thus, these are the complete planets, which are meditated on as a group for the purpose of protection outside the enclosure.

original: de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste /
translated: Then, in order to protect the five ramparts, one should emanate the nāga kings.

original: sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la kha tsha tha pha tha rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du bsams nas /
